scripts.test-ui: npx tsc cypress/support/initialize/retrieveUserInfo.ts --esModuleInterop --target es2022 --moduleResolution node --resolveJsonModule; node --experimental-json-modules cypress/support/initialize/retrieveUserInfo.js --env testclaimer --https true; npx cypress open
scripts.test-cli: npx tsc cypress/support/initialize/retrieveUserInfo.ts --esModuleInterop --target es2022 --moduleResolution node --resolveJsonModule; node --experimental-json-modules cypress/support/initialize/retrieveUserInfo.js --env testclaimer --https true;npx cypress run --browser chrome
